ARGUMENT
i r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evlval.q | |- Q = ( I eval R ) |
| 2 |  | evlval.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> ( i evalSub r ) = ( I evalSub R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( Base ` r ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( Base ` r ) = B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> ( Base ` r ) = B ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( ( i = I /\ r = R ) -> ( ( i evalSub r ) ` ( Base ` r ) ) = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-evl | |- eval = ( i e. _V , r e. _V |-> ( ( i evalSub r ) ` ( Base ` r ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) e. _V |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I eval R ) = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) ) |
| 11 | 8 | #P_mpt2ndm0 | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I eval R ) = (/) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_0fv | |- ( (/) ` B ) = (/) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I eval R ) = ( (/) ` B ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_reldmevls | |- Rel dom evalSub |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ovprc | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I evalSub R ) = (/) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) = ( (/) ` B ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( -. ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) -> ( I eval R ) = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_pm2.61i | |- ( I eval R ) = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) |
| 19 | 1, 18 | #P_eqtri | |- Q = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) |
